attributes.action: Close universities until Covid-19 is under better control
attributes.additional_details: University students have been stressed enough as it is. starting university, meeting new people. And now they also have to deal with the rules concerning social distancing and wearing masks. Maybe even being put into groups in their courses to ensure social distancing and it isn’t fair. The lecturers at these same unis also have to deal with the stress of making sure their students are abiding by the rules and putting themselves in danger by meeting multiple students from different areas of the country.
attributes.background: Close universities until Covid-19 is in a stable place and more students will be allowed back into lecture rooms and smaller spaces to ensure less stress on the students as well as the lecturers and staff

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552512
